snippet: Wise Dan, a two-time horse of the year, will not run in the Breeders’ Cup because of an ankle injury that probably occurred Oct. 4 in his win in the Shadwell Turf Mile at Keeneland.
abstract: Wise Dan, two-time Horse of the Year, will not run in the Breeders’ Cup because of an ankle injury.
lead_paragraph: Wise Dan, a two-time horse of the year, will not run in the Breeders’ Cup because of an ankle injury that probably occurred Oct. 4 in his win in the Shadwell Turf Mile at Keeneland.

headline.main: Wise Dan Out of Breeders’ Cup With Ankle Injury
headline.print_headline: Wise Dan Out of Breeders’ Cup With Ankle Injury
